Title: The Last 10 Years
Writer: Ruka Kosaka, Yoshikazu Okada, Mako Watanabe
Actors: Nana Komatsu, Kentarô Sakaguchi, Yûki Yamada
Plot: Twenty-year-old Matsuri Takabayashi learns that she only has ten years to live due to an incurable disease. She decides to not dwell on her life and not to fall in love, but she meets Kazuto Manabe at a school reunion.
